actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate a certain portion of Black Creek in Mississippi for potential addition to the Wild and Scenic River System.

summary.text: Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate a specified portion of Black Creek in Mississippi as a potential addition to the wild and scenic rivers system.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate a certain portion of Black Creek in Mississippi for potential addition to the Wild and Scenic River System.
